description: Cloud Functions for Bible Buddy API v2

scripts.serve-dev: firebase use dev && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.serve-prod: firebase use prod && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.deploy: firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy-prod: firebase use prod && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy-email: firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only functions:email-functions
scripts.deploy-notification: firebase use dev && firebase deploy --only functions:notification-functions
